title: Itlachiayaque (dNetHack)
data:
| \[   Itlachiayaque   *(No tile)* |                                                                                                                                                             |
| -------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                        | [roundshield](/wiki/Roundshield "Roundshield")                                                                                                              |
|                                  |                                                                                                                                                             |
| Affiliation                      | - [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful")
- [Archeologist](/wiki/Archeologist "Archeologist")
- [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifacts "Intelligent artifacts")  |
|                                  |                                                                                                                                                             |
| When carried                     | * [ESP](/wiki/ESP "ESP")
* [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage")
* [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") |
| When worn                        | - dragonbreath [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection")
- [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance")                                     |
| When invoked                     | * [stinking cloud](/wiki/Scroll_of_stinking_cloud "Scroll of stinking cloud")                                                                               |
|                                  |                                                                                                                                                             |
| Base price                       | 3000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                          |
| Weight                           | [90](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                 |

**Itlachiayaque** is the [Archeologist](/wiki/Archeologist "Archeologist") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), which adapt the artifact from [L](/wiki/L_\(person\) "L (person)")'s [Itlachiayaque](/wiki/Itlachiayaque "Itlachiayaque") Patch against [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"), and is the prize for completing the [Archeologist quest](/wiki/Archeologist_quest "Archeologist quest"). Its default alignment is [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [roundshield](/wiki/Roundshield "Roundshield") made of [obsidian](/wiki/Obsidian "Obsidian").

## Generation

Itlachiayaque cannot be [wished](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for, though it can be left behind as part of a [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") level.

For Archeologists, Itlachiayaque is always generated on the goal level of the [Archeologist quest](/wiki/Archeologist_quest "Archeologist quest"), and is placed on the [altar](/wiki/Altar "Altar") to [Huhetotl](/wiki/Huhetotl "Huhetotl") where the [Minion of Huhetotl](/wiki/Minion_of_Huhetotl "Minion of Huhetotl") stands at level creation.

## Description

Itlachiayaque grants [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance"), [telepathy](/wiki/Telepathy "Telepathy") and [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage") while carried, and grants [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") and [dragonbreath reflection](/wiki/Reflection#dNetHack "Reflection") while worn. [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") Itlachiayaque allows the character to create a mass of [poison clouds](/wiki/Poison_cloud "Poison cloud") similar to the [read](/wiki/Read "Read") [scroll of stinking cloud](/wiki/Scroll_of_stinking_cloud "Scroll of stinking cloud").

## Encyclopedia entry

Tezcatlipoca (Fiery Mirror) was undoubtedly the Jupiter of the  
Nahua pantheon. He carried a mirror or shield \[ Itlachiayaque ],  
from which he took his name, and in which he was supposed to see  
reflected the actions and deeds of mankind. The evolution of this  
god from the status of a spirit of wind or air to that of the  
supreme deity of the Aztec people presents many points of deep  
interest to students of mythology.

\[ The Myths of Mexico and Peru, by Lewis Spence ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Itlachiayaque_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit)*

html:
Itlachiayaque (dNetHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[   Itlachiayaque   (No tile)
Base item roundshield
Affiliation
  • lawful
  • Archeologist
  • intelligent
When carried
  • ESP
  • half spell damage
  • magic resistance
When worn
  • dragonbreath reflection
  • fire resistance
When invoked
  • stinking cloud
Base price 3000 zm
Weight 90

Itlachiayaque is the Archeologist quest artifact in dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, which adapt the artifact from L's Itlachiayaque Patch against NetHack 3.4.3, and is the prize for completing the Archeologist quest. Its default alignment is lawful, and its base item is a roundshield made of obsidian.

Generation

Itlachiayaque cannot be wished for, though it can be left behind as part of a bones level.

For Archeologists, Itlachiayaque is always generated on the goal level of the Archeologist quest, and is placed on the altar to Huhetotl where the Minion of Huhetotl stands at level creation.

Description

Itlachiayaque grants magic resistance, telepathy and half spell damage while carried, and grants fire resistance and dragonbreath reflection while worn. Invoking Itlachiayaque allows the character to create a mass of poison clouds similar to the read scroll of stinking cloud.

Encyclopedia entry

Tezcatlipoca (Fiery Mirror) was undoubtedly the Jupiter of the
Nahua pantheon. He carried a mirror or shield [ Itlachiayaque ],
from which he took his name, and in which he was supposed to see
reflected the actions and deeds of mankind. The evolution of this
god from the status of a spirit of wind or air to that of the
supreme deity of the Aztec people presents many points of deep
interest to students of mythology.

[ The Myths of Mexico and Peru, by Lewis Spence ]
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
